txt.en: Atta can be found in Hultvís.\n\nAtta has offered to tell you the tale of the night he encountered Úbil the Snatcher.
Atta can be found in Hultvís.\n\nYou have heard the tale of Atta's encounter with Úbil the Snatcher. You should talk to Atta.
When Atta was a boy, the creature known as the Snatcher returned to the Vales of Anduin and once again sought to prey on the weak and helpless.
'Are you prepared to hear my tale?'

'Many years later, I learned that Beorn had died. 

'It was said that the Snatcher was driven off by his kin, but the Snatcher lives longer than Men... longer even than those with the gift of Beorn.

'If ever I dared to leave Hultvís, how can I be certain that Úbil does not still lie in wait for me?'

'Forgive me, [placeholder]. After all this time, the memory of that night still pains my heart.'

Atta grasps loosely at his throat and appears to look through you for a moment.

'It is not Old Mad Ubb that the children of Hultvís should fear, but Úbil the Snatcher....'
